title: Ganna Obliterates Opening TT as Van der Poel, Pidcock, Ayuso Chase Classics and Giro Form at Tirreno-Adriatico
content:
Filippo Ganna blows away Juan Ayuso with 56kph TT in warning shot ahead of San Remo, Roubaix.

Read the full article at Ganna Obliterates Opening TT as Van der Poel, Pidcock, Ayuso Chase Classics and Giro Form at Tirreno-Adriatico on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
